general_advisory: Ensure to minimize white grub infestation in groundnut, manage mites in chilli, control aphid in tomato, attract and kill white fly in brinjal, plant onion seedlings properly, and control leaf blight, stem rot, and root knot nematode in tuberose. Vaccinate animals against diseases and store fodder for winter months. Insulate poultry house during winter.

advisory: Drenching Chloropyriphos or Imidacloprid to minimize white grub infestation.
Spray Ethion, Spiromesifen, or Propargite to manage mites in chilli.
Spray neem oil formulation or Flonicam to control aphid in tomato.
Use yellow sticky traps to attract and kill white fly in brinjal.
Spray neem-based pesticide or chemical pesticides to control pests.
Plant onion seedlings properly in the main field.
Spray Fenamidone + Mancozeb or Cymoxanil + Mancozeb to control leaf blight.
Apply carbendazim + mancozeb to control stem rot.
Spray carbofuran to control root knot nematode.
Vaccinate animals against FMD, Haemorrhagic Septicaemia, Black Quarter, Enterotoxemia, etc.
Cut perennial grasses at this time.
Insulate poultry house against cold wind.
Ensure proper ventilation to avoid ammonia build up.
Feed mineral and calcium to laying birds.
